<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ;;;RT audio out, midi in, note=p4 and velocity=p5 -odac -+rtmidi=virtual -M0d --midi-key=4 --midi-velocity-amp=5 ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o cpsmidinn.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
massign 0, 1 ;assign all midi to instr. 1
instr 1 ;play virtual keyboard
inote = p4 icps = cpsmidinn(inote) asig oscil 0.6, icps, 1 print icps outs asig, asig
endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> f0 20 ;sine wave. f 1 0 16384 10 1 ;play note from score too i1 0 1 60 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
